content: अभ्यधिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} More than, exceeding, beyond; सद्यः प्रसूताप्रियापीतादभ्यधिकं <ls>U. 4. 1</ls> remaining after &c. <ls>Pt. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Surpassing, more than in quality or quantity, higher, greater; एष चाभ्यधिकोऽस्माकं गुणः <ls>Rām.</ls>; न त्वत्समोस्त्यभ्यधिकः कुतोन्यः <ls>Bg. 11. 43</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 3</ls>, <ls>Ms. 7. 177</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 295</ls>; sometimes with <ab>abl.</ab> or <ab>instr.</ab>; धान्यं दशभ्यः कुंभेभ्यो हरतोऽभ्यधिकं वधः <ls>Ms. 8. 320</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">322</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 27</ls>; प्रभुः क्षमावान् वीरश्च दाता चाभ्यधिको नृपैः <ls>Nala. 21. 13.</ls> {@--3@} More than ordinary, extraordinary, preeminent; भव पंचाभ्यधिकः <ls>Ś. 6. 2.</ls> --कं {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} Very much, exceedingly.
